Oven-Baked Art: Use the oven to create unique pieces of art by painting on canvas or paper and then baking them in the oven to set the paint. This can create interesting textures andffects.
Oven-Dried Flowers: Use the oven to dry flowers by placing them on a baking sheet and baking them at a low temperature for several hours. This can create beautiful, fragrant decorations.

Oven-Roasted Vegetables: Roast vegetables in the oven to bring out their natural sweetness and add depth of flavor to dishes. This can be done by tossing the vegetables with olive oil and seasonings and roasting them in the oven at a high temperature for 20-30 minutes.

Oven-Baked Chocolate Chip Cookies: Bake chocolate chip cookies in the oven to create perfectly chewy and delicious cookies. This can be done by mixing together flour, sugar, butter, eggs, and chocolate chips and baking the mixture in the oven at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

Oven-Baked Bread: Bake bread in the oven to create a crispy crust and a soft, fluffy interior. This can be done by mixing together flour, yeast, sugar, salt, and water and baking the mixture in the oven at 375°F for 25-30 minutes.
